mapper.select: select total_count,into_organization,resource_num,total_store,exchange from GP_SZZF_R.WKYPT_TOTAL_OVERVIEW order by sync_date desc limit 1
select "DWMC","SJL_WT" from "GP_SZZF_R"."JRPM_JRZL" order by SJL_WT desc;
select "name","total" from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_DAILY_INCREASE" order by "sync_date" desc limit 5
select "DWMC","SJL_WT" from "GP_SZZF_R"."JRPM_QB" order by SJL_WT desc;
select SBPT,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_W"."SP" group by SBPT

select "day_exchange_num","month_exchange_num", "into_organization","into_city","into_resource","into_resource_data","into_resource_file", "into_resource_api","share_data","share_file","share_api","total_exchange", "total_exchange_store","exchange_resource","total_theme","total_theme_store", "theme_resource","total_dept","total_dept_store","dept_resource","wash_data","offline_num", "data_num","real_data" from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_EXCHANGE_SHARED" order by "sync_date" desc limit 1
select "JHSJL_WT","WTSL_WT" from "GP_SZZF_R"."SJZL" order by TBSJ DESC ;
select "BM","ZQJHSL","WTJHSL","WJHSL" from "GP_SZZF_R"."XLPM_LX" order by ZQJHSL desc
select "BM","ZQJHSL","WTJHSL","WJHSL" from "GP_SZZF_R"."XLPM_SS" order by ZQJHSL desc
select "BM","ZQJHSL","WTJHSL","WJHSL" from "GP_SZZF_R"."XLPM_QB" order by ZQJHSL desc
select "Query_data_volume","Volume_unquestioned" from "GP_SZZF_R"."WKYPT_QUESTION_PROPORTION" order by "sync_date" desc limit 1
